question: How many calls to fib(2) and to fib(1) does fib(8) make?

options.answer: fib(2) is called 5 times and fib(1) is called 8 times
fib(2) is called 8 times and fib(1) is called 13 times
fib(2) is called 8 times and fib(1) is called 5 times
fib(2) is called 13 times and fib(1) is called 5 times
fib(2) is called 13 times and fib(1) is called 8 times
